Article Title: Auston Matthews and his fans got emotional as his mother opened up about the financial struggles of getting him into hockey
Article Text:
Image credit - Paige Taylor White/CP

Auston Matthews‚Äô hockey dream wasn‚Äôt cheap and his mom took the weight

‚ÄúI used to work in the morning for Starbucks, in the afternoon the restaurant, i was very fortunate to have two jobs. And believe me, if they would have more hours, I would have more jobs."





Before Auston Matthews was an NHL superstar, his biggest supporter was clocking into two jobs, trying to make ends meet. His mom, Ema Matthews, didn‚Äôt just believe in his dream, she bankrolled it, penny by penny, from behind a Starbucks counter. For families without deep pockets, hockey can be financially brutal. But Ema‚Äôs resilience turned obstacles into opportunity and her son into one of the league‚Äôs brightest stars. Her story is the heartwarming reminder that every great athlete often has a real-life superhero cheering from the sidelines, sacrificing, hustling, and holding it all together so their child can chase the impossible.Ice time, gear, coaching, travel, youth hockey isn‚Äôt just a sport, it‚Äôs a financial beast. For the Matthews family, especially with Ema being originally from Hermosillo, Mexico, the culture and cost of the sport were both daunting. But she took on the challenge without hesitation, picking up multiple jobs including a gig at Starbucks to ensure Auston never missed a chance to grow on the ice. She juggled long hours, late nights, and early mornings, often sacrificing her own comfort and time just to make sure Auston‚Äôs hockey dreams stayed alive and on track.Ema shared in a past interview that the cost of hockey often reached up to $20,000 a year, a heavy ask for any middle-class family. To make it work, she didn‚Äôt just cut corners, she picked up shifts and poured lattes while helping Auston stay focused on the sport. She even deposited small amounts of money in his account so he could grab food with teammates like a regular teen. Beyond that, Ema often drove long hours to tournaments, handled equipment costs, and juggled bills, all to ensure Auston had every chance to chase his dreams without added stress.Ema‚Äôs story also breaks stereotypes. In a sport dominated by players from Canada and northern U.S. states, Auston‚Äôs rise as a player of Mexican heritage makes his success even more impactful. It's not just about talent, it‚Äôs about trailblazing, especially for kids of color or immigrant families who rarely see themselves represented in hockey.Auston Matthews is one of the Toronto Maple Leafs‚Äô biggest stars and a face of the NHL. He‚Äôs not just known for his goal-scoring skills but also for his poise and work ethic, traits his mom likely helped instill. While fans celebrate his success on the ice, stories like Ema‚Äôs remind us of the sacrifices behind the scenes that made it possible, from long car rides to practices, emotional support during tough losses, and the quiet strength that helped shape his journey to stardom.Ema Matthews‚Äô story shows what‚Äôs possible when love, grit, and hustle lead the way, proving that behind every great athlete stands a family whose unwavering support shapes both their character and their incredible achievements. Her journey highlights the sacrifices, encouragement, and strength that fuel success, reminding us that triumphs on the ice are built far beyond the rink, in the hearts and homes of those who believe the most.Also read - ‚ÄúFrom baptism to strip club‚Äù: Pete Blackburn‚Äôs unhinged NHL comparison is going viral and fans totally get it
Article Summary: Auston matthews is one of the toronto maple leafs‚Äô biggest stars and a face of the nhl. His mom, ema matthews, didn‚Äôt just believe in his dream, she bankrolled it, penny by penny, from behind a starbucks counter. Ema often drove long hours to tournaments, handled equipment costs, and juggled bills.

Article Title: Stephen Curry enjoys relaxing beach vacation with wife Ayesha after Golden State Warriors‚Äô early playoff exit
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Ayesha Curry Shares Intimate Moments from Their Beach Getaway





After a season that saw the Golden State Warriors' championship dreams fall apart in the second round of the NBA playoffs, Stephen Curry is now enjoying some well-earned relaxation. Following a hamstring injury that kept him out during the Warriors' 4-1 series loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves, Curry is basking in the sun alongside his wife, Ayesha Curry . The couple has recently shared some moments from their beach vacation, reflecting their strong connection and love for adventure.On social media, Ayesha Curry posted some honest vacation photos, including a shirtless Stephen flexing next to her. The couple has been married since 2011 and has been together since their teenage years, raising four children: Riley, 12, Ryan, 9, Canon, 6, and Caius, 1. Their latest getaway is a unique opportunity for them to chill out without the kids, allowing them to reconnect and savor each other's presence.The Currys have had beach vacations before. Earlier this year, they were seen in Mexico during the NBA All-Star break, where Ayesha looked amazing in a bikini next to Steph. Their knack for juggling family life and personal time really highlights how strong their relationship is.The Currys have been enjoying their offseason beyond their beach retreat by attending events like the BottleRock festival in Napa Valley. Stephen went viral for his enthusiastic participation during Benson Boone's performance, knowing every lyric to the song "Beautiful Things." The couple also promoted Stephen's Gentleman's Cut bourbon at the event, showcasing their entrepreneurial efforts.These activities highlight the Currys' dedication to enjoying life beyond the basketball limelight. While Stephen is on the mend and gearing up for the new season, Ayesha remains supportive of her husband's endeavors and helps keep their family in the public eye.As the Golden State Warriors enter a significant offseason after their swift playoff exit, the spotlight is on reconstructing and fortifying the team for the future. Stephen Curry, who is now 37, still plays a vital role in the Warriors' plans, with aspirations of clinching another championship to add to his impressive career.Also Read: Kevin Durant and Paolo Banchero viral training clip sparks Orlando Magic trade speculation amid Phoenix Suns' uncertain offseason This summer is all about resting and preparing the Curry family for the demands ahead. Ayesha maintains running their many business activities and helping their children develop while Stephen focuses on his recuperation and training. Taken together, they show the ideal mix between their personal happiness and work life.
Article Summary: Stephen curry and his wife, ayesha, have been enjoying a beach getaway. The couple has been married since 2011 and have four children. The vacation reflects their strong connection and love for adventure. Stephen is recovering from a hamstring injury that kept him out of the nba playoffs.

Article Title: ‚ÄúA drug dealer‚Äù: Stefon Diggs accused of handing out ‚Äòpink cocaine‚Äô on boat party with women as NFL stays silent
Article Text:
Stefon Diggs faces scrutiny after a video surfaced (Image via AP)

Stefon Diggs under fire as viral boat video ignites drug-related rumors

Coach Mike Vrabel and the Patriots respond with discretion





New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is back in the spotlight for all the wrong reasons. A recently surfaced video shows the star NFL player on a boat with a group of women, allegedly handing them a bag filled with pink crystals. The footage, which quickly spread across social media, has fueled intense speculation over the nature of the substance ‚Äî with many users suspecting it to be ‚Äúpink cocaine,‚Äù though there is no confirmation of that claim.In the viral video, Stefon Diggs is seen chatting casually with three women who reportedly referred to him as ‚ÄúDaddy‚Äù before he passed around the bag of pink material. ‚ÄúYikes: NFL fans are speculating that Stefon Diggs handed these three girls what looks to be pink c*caine after he asked them to call him Daddy,‚Äù one user wrote on X (formerly Twitter). Others followed suit with similar reactions, suggesting Diggs was ‚Äúserving pink cocaine‚Äù and even labeling him ‚Äúa football player, pimp and a drug dealer. ‚ÄùDespite the wave of viral commentary, there is currently no official evidence confirming that the substance was illicit. Still, the video has created a media storm, putting both Diggs and the Patriots in a difficult position during the offseason.When asked about the situation, Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel addressed the controversy during a media session ahead of an optional team practice, which Diggs did not attend.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs something that we‚Äôre aware of. Obviously, we want to make great decisions on and off the field,‚Äù Vrabel said. He added that his discussions with Diggs ‚Äúwill remain between him I and the club.‚ÄùThe NFL has chosen not to comment on the situation at this time, with a league spokesperson telling the Associated Press there would be no statement regarding the video.Also Read: T.J. Watt skips Steelers OTAs amid contract extension drama that could shake up Pittsburgh's 2025 season Adding another layer to the situation, Stefon Diggs has recently been linked to Grammy-winning rapper Cardi B. The two were seen leaving the Met Gala together earlier this month and later sat courtside at a Knicks-Celtics playoff game. Cardi B, who filed for divorce from rapper Offset last year, was reportedly also on the boat during the controversial outing.As the video continues to circulate online, all eyes are on the NFL and Stefon Diggs‚Äô camp for an official response.
Article Summary: New england patriots wide receiver stefon diggs is back in the spotlight for all the wrong reasons. A recently surfaced video shows the star nfl player on a boat with a group of women, allegedly handing them a bag filled with pink crystals. The footage, which quickly spread across social media, has fueled intense speculation over the nature of the substance.

Article Title: When is XXXTentacion coming to Fortnite? Here‚Äôs everything you need to know
Article Text:
Image via Epic Games

A legacy continued through music and gaming

Gekyume talks about his dad, xxxtentacion





Fortnite is no stranger to high-profile collaborations, and the next big name joining the island is none other than the late rapper XXXTentacion. In a move that blends music, nostalgia, and gaming, Epic Games is teaming up with EMPIRE and the estates of XXXTentacion and Juice WRLD for a special in-game event and new content rollout.The major highlight? A remix of XXXTentacion‚Äôs ‚Äúwhoa (mind in awe)‚Äù featuring Juice WRLD is dropping on May 30, along with the much-anticipated release of the XXXTentacion Emote inside Fortnite. This collaboration marks the official arrival of X into the Fortnite universe.In addition to the music release, Fortnite players can look forward to a special in-game event on May 31. The event will take place on Fortnite‚Äôs Super Red vs. Blue Island, an experiential map known for hosting fan-favorite music tie-ins.The event will also feature four of XXXTentacion‚Äôs songs, including his breakout hit ‚ÄúLook at Me!‚Äù - giving fans a unique chance to hear his music in an immersive, virtual setting. This continues a recent trend where Fortnite has honored iconic artists posthumously, following tributes to Juice WRLD and in-game features involving artists like Snoop Dogg and Ice Spice.The remix of ‚Äúwhoa‚Äù isn‚Äôt just a typical drop. Juice WRLD‚Äôs verse, recorded back in December 2018 after X‚Äôs passing, gives the track a unique sense of emotion and legacy. With lyrics centered around light, healing, and resilience, the song reflects both artists‚Äô vulnerable and poetic style.Fans have already reacted positively to the announcement, especially after the estates shared a touching video tribute showcasing XXXTentacion‚Äôs Jamaican roots and love for football ‚Äî a nod to his upbringing and culture.The Fortnite collaboration also aligns with the mission of the XXXTentacion Foundation, which continues to celebrate the rapper‚Äôs legacy through creative and community-driven initiatives.Just weeks ahead of the release, X‚Äôs son Gekyume went viral for a touching message to his father. In a video shared on social media, the six-year-old expressed his love for XXXTentacion during a casual interview - melting fans‚Äô hearts and adding an emotional touch to the upcoming release.As the date draws near, Fortnite players and music fans alike are eagerly awaiting what promises to be one of the game‚Äôs most emotional and artistic collaborations yet.Mark your calendars: XXXTentacion lands in Fortnite on May 30.
Article Summary: Epic games is teaming up with empire and the estates of xxxtentacion and juice wrld for a special in-game event and new content rollout. The major highlight? A remix of xxx tentacion‚Äôs ‚Äúwhoa (mind in awe)‚Äù featuring juice w rld is dropping on may 30. This collaboration marks the official arrival of x into the fortnite universe.

Article Title: ‚ÄúMarried to the bag‚Äù: Travis Hunter‚Äôs wife Leanna Lenee sparks controversy again over a particular tattoo on her ring finger
Article Text:
Image via Leanna Lenee/Instagram

Travis Hunter‚Äôs wife, Leanna Lenee, is now being trolled for a particular tattoo she has on her ring finger



Cam Newton has stood by Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee







Travis Hunter, the recent Heisman Trophy winner, has a lot going on with his life and the NFL rookie recently tied the knot with his long term fiancee, Leanna Lenee. Even though Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee have been dating for a couple of years now, their relationship has been in the news since December 2024 after Lenee failed to stand up quickly when Hunter received his Heisman Trophy. With the two tying the knot last weekend, it seems like fans have uncovered a new thing about Leanna Lenee to target and mock her.A few months ago, Travis Hunter‚Äôs wife, Leanna Lenee, was being mocked for a certain tattoo she has on her ring finger. Owing to their wedding, the topic has now resurfaced and fans are not holding back.For the unversed, Travis Hunter‚Äôs wife, Leanna Lenee, has a ‚Äú$‚Äù tattoo on her ring finger.A fan took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs literally insane if you put some thought into it lol because thought went into that tattoo lol‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúLove how she‚Äôs not subtle at all. Just a baby girl who recognizes her power‚ú®‚ÄùA third fan commented, ‚ÄúThe ring finger tattoo & butterfly tattoo are some major red flags‚Äù, while another user posted, ‚ÄúAye bruh nobody going to feel sorry for buddy everyone tried to warn him ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ÄùA fifth fan noted, ‚ÄúMarried to the moneyüò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠‚Äù, while another fan joked, ‚ÄúGod forbid a woman is married to the bag.‚ÄùTravis Hunter‚Äôs wife, Leanna Lenee, was mocked for this tattoo even back in December 2024 but she maintained her silence over the significance of this particular tattoo.While Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee are getting heavily trolled and mocked for their wedding, former NFL star, Cam Newton has supported them through this ordeal.On a recent episode of Cam Newton‚Äôs popular podcast, 4th&1 With Cam Newton, the former NFL star said, ‚ÄúCongratulations to the Hunters.You know his wife, LL Cool J. She cool. She has been a punching bag, and it‚Äôs unfortunate.‚ÄùCam Newton added, ‚ÄúBut guess what, baby, who‚Äôs laughing now? I‚Äôm so happy for Travis because this young man has done everything asked and then some.‚ÄùHowever, at this point in time, Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, have maintained complete silence. A few months ago, the NFL rookie had stood up for Leanna Lenee but it seems like the couple is now unbothered by all the noise and negativity around them.Also Read: ‚ÄúWho‚Äôs laughing now?‚Äù: Travis Hunter‚Äôs marriage to Leanna Lenee gets Cam Newton‚Äôs support amid "gold digger" claims
Article Summary: Travis hunter‚Äôs wife, leanna lenee, has a ‚Äú$‚Äù tattoo on her ring finger. The topic has now resurfaced and fans are not holding back. Former nfl star, cam newton has supported the couple through this ordeal.

Article Title: Champions League final: PSG hammer Inter Milan 5-0 to win first-ever title
Article Text:
PSG's Marquinhos holds up the trophy as he celebrates with his teammates after winning the Champions League final at the Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany, Saturday, May 31, 2025. (AP)

Poll Do you think Inter Milan will recover from this defeat? Yes, they will bounce back No, it will affect them long-term

Match summary:





Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) won the Champions League for the first time by beating Inter Milan 5-0 on Saturday (local time). Luis Enrique‚Äôs young team dominated the match, with teenager Desire Doue scoring twice in what became the biggest winning margin in the history of the final of the tournament, which began in 1956.Achraf Hakimi, facing his former club, scored the opening goal early in the game. Doue‚Äôs shot took a deflection and gave PSG a 2-0 lead in the 20th minute. He scored again just after the hour mark, making the result certain. Khvicha Kvaratskhelia added the fourth goal, and substitute Senny Mayulu made it five.Inter struggled throughout the match. PSG‚Äôs victory is the biggest in a final since the European Cup and Champions League began 70 years ago.This win comes after years of investment by PSG‚Äôs Qatari owners. It also follows their 2020 loss to Bayern Munich in their only other final. PSG had already won the French league and cup this season. They are now only the second French club to win the Champions League, after Marseille, who beat AC Milan in 1993, also in Munich.PSG coach Luis Enrique has now won the Champions League twice. He previously won it with Barcelona 10 years ago.The current PSG squad was built over the last two years and came together after Kylian Mbappe left the club.Doue, who turns 20 on Tuesday, was the standout player in the final.Inter Milan could not add a fourth Champions League title. Their last win was in 2010. Coach Simone Inzaghi has now taken Inter to the final twice in three years and lost both times. They also missed out on the Serie A title this season and end the campaign without a trophy.PSG took the lead in the 12th minute. Vitinha passed to Doue, who squared the ball to Hakimi. Hakimi scored into an empty net and did not celebrate against his old club.This was the earliest goal in a Champions League final since 2019. Inter had little hope after conceding early. The last time both teams scored in a final was in 2018. The last team to concede first and still win was Real Madrid in 2014.PSG scored again on a counterattack. Willian Pacho stopped Inter from getting a corner. His clearance went to Kvaratskhelia, who passed to Ousmane Dembele. Dembele found Doue, who shot past goalkeeper Yann Sommer with a deflection off Federico Dimarco.Inter had one chance in the first half when Marcus Thuram‚Äôs header went wide. Things got worse in the second half. Defender Yann Bisseck came on for Benjamin Pavard but had to go off injured after 10 minutes.PSG scored a third in the 63rd minute. Dembele flicked the ball to Vitinha, who passed to Doue. Doue beat Sommer at the near post. He was then substituted and applauded by the crowd.PSG added more goals. Dembele passed to Kvaratskhelia, who scored the fourth in the 73rd minute. Mayulu then scored the fifth after playing a one-two with Bradley Barcola in the 86th minute.This was the first time a team had scored five goals in the Champions League final since Benfica in 1962.
Article Summary: Paris saint-germain beat inter milan 5-0 in the champions league final. It is the biggest winning margin in the history of the final of the tournament. Psg had already won the french league and cup this season. They are now only the second french club to win the competition.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Will rain affect PBKS vs MI Qualifier 2 in Ahmedabad?
Article Text:
The Narendra Modu Stadium is experiencing slight drizzles a day ahead of the clash between MI and PBKS (Image via X/toi_gauravG)

IPL 2025 Winner Prediction: What Greenstone Lobo's Astrology says

Ahmedabad weather forecast for Sunday, June 1

AccuWeather predicts the possibility of late showers in Ahmedabad on the day of Qualifier 2 (Image via AccuWeather)

What happens if it rains during PBKS vs MI?

Poll What impact do you think the rain will have on the match? Game will be played without interruptions Rain will delay the game Game will be washed out

What happens if PBKS vs MI is washed out?

Josh Hazlewood - we picked up momentum from Jitesh‚Äôs knock in Lucknow





Just two days after Mumbai Indians knocked Gujarat Titans out of IPL 2025 in the Eliminator, the Hardik Pandya-led side will return for Qualifier 2 against Punjab Kings in Ahmedabad on Sunday.While Royal Challengers Bengaluru have already confirmed their spot in the final with an emphatic win over Punjab Kings in Qualifier 1, MI and PBKS will battle it out for the second spot in the summit clash at the Narendra Modi Stadium.The final is scheduled for June 3 at the same venue.However, the weather in Ahmedabad points to the possibility of rain playing spoilsport in the penultimate game of IPL 2025. It is understood that the Narendra Modi Stadium is experiencing frequent showers, although no heavy rains have been reported. A PBKS training session was briefly affected by rain as well.Threats of rain spoiling the high octane clash persist as weather forecasts suggest the likelihood of showers. The mercury will rise to a maximum of 38 degrees, with it dipping to a low of 31¬∞C in the evening. AccuWeather predicts a breezy evening, with the possibility of late showers.While the possibility of the game being washed out is minimal, there remains adequate reason for caution.If the game on Sunday is delayed due to rain, there is a 120-minute window up until which it can be pushed back.If Qualifier 2 between Shreyas Iyer-led Punjab and Hardik Pandya's MI does not take place, the table-toppers will get automatic qualification to the final by virtue of their superior finish in the points table after the league stage. PBKS finished top of the table with 19 points while MI made the playoffs after finishing fourth with 16 points.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians take on punjab kings in ipl 2025 qualifier 2 on sunday. Royal challengers bengaluru have already confirmed their spot in the final. The final is scheduled for june 3 at the narendra modi stadium. Weather forecasts suggest the likelihood of rain spoiling the game.

Article Title: IPL match today, PBKS vs MI: Team prediction, head-to-head, pitch report, Ahmedabad weather update
Article Text:
Mumbai Indians' captain Hardik Pandya and Punjab Kings' captain Shreyas Iyer (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

PBKS vs MI Head-to-Head

IPL 2025 Winner Prediction: What Greenstone Lobo's Astrology says

PBKS vs MI: Pitch Report

PBKS vs MI: Predicted XIs

Punjab Kings predicted XI:

Mumbai Indians predicted XI:

PBKS vs MI: Ahmedabad Weather update

PBKS vs MI: Live Streaming details

PBKS vs MI squads

Punjab Kings:

Mumbai Indians:





Mumbai Indians (MI) head into the IPL 2025 Qualifier 2 with a historical edge and recent momentum on their side, as they prepare to face a shaken Punjab Kings (PBKS) on Sunday in Ahmedabad.MI, under Hardik Pandya's leadership, are eyeing a sixth title after a 20-run win over Gujarat Titans in the Eliminator. In contrast, Shreyas Iyer-led PBKS enter the do-or-die clash low on confidence, following a heavy defeat to Royal Challengers Bengaluru in Qualifier 1.MI‚Äôs depth and experience in knockout games, coupled with standout performances from Rohit Sharma, Jasprit Bumrah and Suryakumar Yadav, give them a clear advantage. The form of Jonny Bairstow and Richard Gleeson has also strengthened their case. Bumrah‚Äôs tactical deployment has been key, offering MI control even on batting-friendly tracks.PBKS, meanwhile, must regroup quickly. Their bowling attack ‚Äî missing Marco Jansen and Yuzvendra Chahal ‚Äî looked vulnerable in their previous match. Arshdeep Singh is under pressure to lead an inexperienced unit. The explosive opening pair of Prabhsimran Singh and Priyansh Arya needs to fire, while the team draws belief from a win over MI earlier this season.The outcome may hinge on which bowling unit adapts better to Ahmedabad‚Äôs high-scoring conditions.Total matches played: 33Punjab Kings: 16Mumbai Indians: 17The pitch at Ahmedabad is expected to offer ideal conditions for batting, especially as the match progresses. The surface has a consistent grass covering and a hint of early moisture, but the intense heat is likely to dry it out quickly, making it a true wicket with good bounce and carry. The ball should come on nicely to the bat, favouring stroke play throughout the innings. The square boundaries measure 61 and 67 metres, while the straight boundary stretches to 73 metres, offering some help to the bowlers who can vary their lengths smartly.Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Josh Inglis(w), Shreyas Iyer(c), Nehal Wadhera, Shashank Singh, Marcus Stoinis, Azmatullah Omarzai, Harpreet Brar, Arshdeep Singh, Kyle JamiesonImpact Sub: Suryansh ShedgeJonny Bairstow (w), Rohit Sharma, Corbin Bosch, Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (c), Naman Dhir, Mitchell Santner, Deepak Chahar, Trent Boult, Jasprit BumrahImpact Sub: Karn SharmaSunday‚Äôs IPL 2025 Qualifier 2 in Ahmedabad is expected to enjoy clear weather conditions. The forecast suggests a mostly clear sky with 0% chance of rain during match hours, ensuring a smooth contest without interruptions. Temperatures will remain high, ranging between 36¬∞C and 32¬∞C, making it a warm and breezy evening. While there is a possibility of passing showers late in the night, they are unlikely to affect the game. Saturday also saw brief showers, but conditions remain largely favourable for a high-stakes clash in front of a packed crowd.The PBKS vs MI Qualifier 2 match will be played at the Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad. The match will start at 7:30 pm. The match will be telecasted on Star Sports Network and live streaming will be on JioHotstar.Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Josh Inglis (w), Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Marcus Stoinis, Shashank Singh, Azmatullah Omarzai, Harpreet Brar, Kyle Jamieson, Arshdeep Singh, Musheer Naushad Khan, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Praveen Dubey, Xavier Bartlett, Suryansh Shedge, Yuzvendra Chahal, Vishnu Vinod, Yash Thakur, Aaron Hardie, Kuldeep Sen, Mitchell Owen, Harnoor Singh, Pyla AvinashRohit Sharma, Jonny Bairstow (w), Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (c), Naman Dhir, Mitchell Santner, Raj Bawa, Trent Boult, Jasprit Bumrah, Richard Gleeson, Ashwani Kumar, Robin Minz, Raghu Sharma, Krishnan Shrijith, Reece Topley, Karn Sharma, Deepak Chahar, Charith Asalanka, Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Arjun Tendulkar, Bevon Jacobs, Satyanarayana Raju
Article Summary: Ipl 2025 qualifier 2 will be played at the narendra modi stadium, ahmedabad. Mumbai indians (mi) head into the match with a historical edge and recent momentum. Punjab kings (pbks) enter the do-or-die clash low on confidence, following a heavy defeat to royal challengers bengaluru in qualifier 1.

Article Title: 'Have you received a phone call from Gambhir yet?' Cheteshwar Pujara answers ahead of England tour
Article Text:
Gautam Gambhir and Cheteshwar Pujara

India Test squad vs England: Ajit Agarkar full press conference

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll How do you feel about Shubman Gill being appointed as Test captain at just 25 years old? Excited for his leadership Concerned about his inexperience

RCB vs PBKS, IPL 2025, Qualifier 1: Quick singles from Mullanpur

India Test squad vs England: Ajit Agarkar full press conference





NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs batting mainstays Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, along with ace spinner Ravichandran Ashwin, have retired from Test cricket, while star pacer Mohammed Shami will miss the crucial five-match series in England due to fitness issues.All eyes are now on the Shubman Gill-led Indian side, widely regarded as one of the most inexperienced teams to tour England in recent memory.In the absence of Kohli and Rohit, India's batting line-up appears quite thin in experience. So, could the selectors consider recalling experienced campaigners like Cheteshwar Pujara or Ajinkya Rahane , who are yet to retire from the traditional format, to strengthen the top order?During a recent interview, Pujara was asked whether Gautam Gambhir had reached out to him regarding the England tour."No, not yet," Pujara told Lallantop when asked, "Have you received a phone call from Gambhir yet?"Also See: MI vs GT IPL Live Score The 103-Test veteran expressed his readiness to return if given the opportunity."I am ready. I don't know if they will take me or not. But if I get a chance, yes, it will be an honour to represent the country again. As a cricketer, you always feel that as long as you are fit, as long as you are contributing, and if I have a good performance in domestic cricket, and I am preparing well, if I get a chance, yes, I will be more than happy to be part of the team," Pujara said. Shubman Gill has been handed the responsibility of leading the Indian Test team through a ‚Äúmassive transition‚Äù period, with the dynamic Rishabh Pant appointed as his deputy for what is expected to be a stern challenge in English conditions.At just 25, Gill becomes India‚Äôs fifth youngest Test captain, following in the footsteps of Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi (21), Sachin Tendulkar (23), Kapil Dev (24), and Ravi Shastri (25). The first Test against England is scheduled to begin on June 20 in Leeds."Last year or so we have looked at Shubman (for leadership). We are hopeful he is the guy who is going (to take the team forward). It is a high pressure job but he is a terrific player. We wish him all the best," said chief selector Ajit Agarkar after announcing the 18-member squad, which included no major surprises.Explaining Pant‚Äôs appointment as vice-captain, Agarkar added: "Pant is one of our best batters in Test cricket over the last four-five years. A wicketkeeper can see the game well and that's why he is Shubman's deputy."The squad also features maiden Test call-ups for promising left-hander B Sai Sudharsan and left-arm pacer Arshdeep Singh.
Article Summary: Virat kohli, rohit sharma and ravichandran ashwin have retired from test cricket. Mohammed shami will miss the crucial five-match series in england due to fitness issues. Shubman gill has been handed the responsibility of leading the indian test team. Rishabh pant has been appointed as his deputy.

Article Title: After Shubman Gill, Hardik Pandya also shuts down rumours of rift with Gujarat Titans captain
Article Text: Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya have dismissed rumours of a rift following Gujarat Titans' IPL 2025 elimination, addressing speculation fuelled by on-field interactions and Pandya's move to Mumbai Indians. Both players affirmed their camaraderie on social media after Mumbai Indians' victory in the Eliminator match. Mumbai Indians will play IPL Qualifier 2 against Punjab Kings today.
Article Summary: Shubman gill and hardik pandya have dismissed rumours of a rift following gujarat titans' ipl 2025 elimination. Both players affirmed their camaraderie on social media after mumbai indians' victory in the eliminator match. Mumbai indians will play ipl qualifier 2 against punjab kings today.

Article Title: PSG fans unfurl banner honouring Luis Enrique's daughter who passed away from cancer
Article Text:
Luis Enrique won his second Champions League title, this time with PSG having already won once with Barcelona. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.





Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique said he and the club had achieved their "ultimate goal" by winning the Champions League after the 5-0 thumping of Inter Milan.Since their Qatari takeover in 2011, PSG have won 11 of the past 13 French titles but the grand prize for which the club had spent big had always eluded them.On Saturday, PSG sliced Inter to pieces at the Allianz Arena to emphatically put that right.Luis Enrique, who won the Champions League at the helm of Barcelona in Berlin in 2015, said he had his sights set on the title ever since he took over in the French capital in 2023."On my first day at the PSG campus, my French was even worse than it is today. But I said the ultimate goal for me as a coach was to fill the trophy cabinet," the Spaniard said."The only trophy missing was Champions League. And we've ticked that box. We were ambitious, and we did it."It's in the bag and it's coming home with us tomorrow."The manager singled out forward Ousmane Dembele for special praise, calling him "incredible" and saying "he deserves to win the Ballon d'Or."The coach paid tribute to his daughter Xana, who passed away from cancer in 2019 aged nine.After the full-time whistle, the French fans unfurled a banner depicting father and daughter planting a PSG flag into the ground, just as the two had done with a Barcelona flag in Berlin a decade earlier."It was emotional. It's beautiful that the supporters thought about me and my family. But I don't need to win the Champions League or even a game to think about my daughter," Luis Enrique said."She's always with me. She's supporting me, and our family, and I feel her presence."
Article Summary: Paris saint-germain beat inter milan 5-0 at the allianz arena. Luis enrique won champions league with barcelona in 2015. Psg have won 11 of the past 13 french titles. The spaniard paid tribute to his daughter xana, who passed away in 2019.

Article Title: Watch: Paris goes wild after PSG win maiden Champions League title
Article Text: Paris Saint-Germain fans celebrated their Champions League victory, resulting in nearly 300 arrests due to clashes with police near the Champs-Elysees. A car incident in Grenoble injured four celebrating fans. Despite the unrest, joyous fans sang and danced, celebrating PSG's historic win. President Macron will host the team, and a victory parade is planned on the Champs-Elysees.
Article Summary: Paris saint-germain fans celebrated their champions league victory, resulting in nearly 300 arrests due to clashes with police. A car incident in grenoble injured four celebrating fans. President macron will host the team, and a victory parade is planned on the champs-elysees.

Article Title: PSG win first Champions League title with historic 5-0 victory over Inter Milan
Article Text:
Paris Saint-Germain won the 2025 Champions League by beating Inter Milan in the final in Munich. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.





Paris Saint-Germain won their first-ever Champions League title with a historic 5-0 victory over Inter Milan in Munich on Saturday. Teenager Desire Doue scored twice, while Achraf Hakimi, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, and substitute Senny Mayulu added goals in what became the most one-sided final in the tournament's 70-year history.The French champions dominated from the start, with Doue setting up Hakimi for the opening goal in the 12th minute. Doue then scored his first goal in the 20th minute through a deflected shot.The teenager added his second goal after the hour mark, effectively sealing the victory before Kvaratskhelia and young substitute Mayulu completed the rout."This means everything. It's our dream. It's incredible. The result is not by magic. I'm happy we did it like this," said PSG midfielder Vitinha.The victory marks a significant milestone for PSG, coming after more than a decade of investment from their Qatari owners and five years after their only previous final appearance, where they lost to Bayern Munich.PSG completed a domestic treble with this victory, becoming only the second French club to win Europe's premier competition after Marseille's triumph in 1993.For manager Luis Enrique, it represents his second Champions League title, following his 2015 success with Barcelona."It was the objective since the start of last season to make history. I have felt a really strong connection with the players and the supporters," Luis Enrique told Canal Plus.This PSG team, rebuilt over the past two years following Kylian Mbappe's departure, has emerged as one of the competition's most impressive sides.Inter Milan, seeking their first Champions League title since 2010, failed to match PSG's intensity throughout the match. The defeat means they end the season without any trophies, having also missed out on the Serie A title to Napoli."PSG absolutely deserved to win this match. We are very disappointed," said Inter coach Simone Inzaghi."As a coach I am proud of our campaign, but we're not satisfied with tonight's game. PSG outplayed us. I thanked the players for what they did this season. We won no silverware, but I'm proud."The match at the Allianz Arena saw PSG take control early, with Vitinha's pass finding Doue, who assisted Hakimi for the opener. Hakimi chose not to celebrate against his former club.The second goal came from a counter-attack, with Willian Pacho's clearance leading to a sequence involving Kvaratskhelia, Ousmane Dembele, and Doue, whose shot deflected off Federico Dimarco.Inter's only notable chance came when Marcus Thuram headed wide from a corner in the first half.The second half saw PSG extend their lead further. Dembele and Vitinha combined to set up Doue for his second goal past goalkeeper Yann Sommer.Kvaratskhelia added the fourth goal in the 73rd minute after being released by Dembele.Nineteen-year-old Mayulu completed the scoring in the 86th minute, exchanging passes with Bradley Barcola before finding the net.The five-goal victory marked the first time a team had scored that many in a European Cup final since Benfica in 1962, cementing PSG's place in football history.
Article Summary: Paris saint-germain beat inter milan 5-0 in champions league final in munich. Teenager desire doue scores twice for french champions. Achraf hakimi, khvicha kvaratskhelia, and substitute senny mayulu also score. Psg become only the second french club to win europe's premier competition.

Article Title: PM Modi Meets Teen Sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi at Patna Airport
Article Text:
PM Narendra Modi with Vaibhav Suryavanshi (Pic credit: PM Modi's post)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Everything is special about Vaibhav Suryavanshi: Vikram Rathour

Poll What impresses you most about Vaibhav Suryavanshi? His record-breaking IPL performance Incredible talent at just 14 years old

We have a lot to look forward to next season: Vikram Rathour





NEW DELHI: In a memorable moment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi met 14-year-old cricketing prodigy Vaibhav Suryavanshi and his family at Patna airport, lauding the young batter for his sensational performances in the 2025 IPL season.The meeting came as a touching gesture from the country's highest office, recognising one of the most talked-about talents in Indian cricket today.Taking to social media platform X, the Prime Minister shared photos from the encounter and expressed admiration for the teenager‚Äôs composure and explosive batting.‚ÄúAt Patna airport, met the young cricketing sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi and his family. His cricketing skills are being admired all over the nation! My best wishes to him for his future endeavours,‚Äù PM Modi wrote.Also See: IPL Live Score GT vs MI Suryavanshi has taken the 2025 IPL by storm while representing Rajasthan Royals . In just seven matches, he scored 252 runs, including a blistering century ‚Äî 101 off 38 balls ‚Äî against Gujarat Titans in Jaipur. That knock made him the youngest player to score a hundred in men‚Äôs T20s and the second-fastest centurion in IPL history, reaching his ton in just 35 balls.The surprise meeting with PM Modi now marks another milestone in Suryavanshi‚Äôs rapidly ascending journey. For a 14-year-old still finding his feet, a handshake from the Prime Minister serves as both validation and inspiration ‚Äî a powerful reminder that age is no barrier to greatness.
Article Summary: Pm narendra modi met 14-year-old cricketing prodigy vaibhav suryavanshi at patna airport. The meeting came as a touching gesture from the country's highest office. Pm modi expressed admiration for the teenager‚Äôs composure and explosive batting.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah, Rahul Tewatia engage in heated exchange during IPL 2025 Eliminator
Article Text:
Rahul Tewatia and Jasprit Bumrah

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Who do you think was more at fault in the Bumrah-Tewatia exchange? Jasprit Bumrah Rahul Tewatia

Mahela Jayawardene on Rohit Sharma: 'You cannot replace the experience'





A high-stakes IPL 2025 Eliminator between Mumbai Indians and Gujarat Titans took an intense turn on Friday, not just for the cricket but for a fiery mid-pitch exchange between Jasprit Bumrah and Rahul Tewatia . While Mumbai sealed a thrilling 20-run win to book a spot in Qualifier 2 against Punjab Kings, the moment between the two Indian players became a talking point.The flashpoint came in the 18th over of Gujarat's tense run chase. Tewatia launched Bumrah for a massive six over deep mid-wicket, sending a jolt through MI‚Äôs camp. But the very next delivery saw a swing and a miss, followed by another failed attempt where Tewatia only managed a leg bye. As he rushed to the non-striker's end, he muttered something under his breath ‚Äî words that seemingly irked Bumrah.The usually composed MI spearhead was caught on stump mic, saying, ‚ÄúMereko mat bol (Don't say it to me),‚Äù making it clear he took the remark personally. Tewatia, caught off guard, quickly clarified: ‚ÄúMain tereko nahi bol raha hoon, main khud ko bol raha (I wasn‚Äôt talking to you, I was saying it to myself).‚ÄùThankfully, the moment didn‚Äôt spiral further. Bumrah returned to his mark without escalating the issue, and Tewatia too kept his focus on the game. The brief exchange highlighted the intensity of knockout cricket ‚Äî where emotions often run high, even between country mates.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians beat gujarat titans by 20 runs in ipl 2025 eliminator. Jasprit bumrah and rahul tewatia had a fiery mid-pitch exchange. The flashpoint came in the 18th over of gujarat's tense run chase.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Qualifier 2: Punjab Kings likely to get Yuzvendra Chahal boost against Mumbai Indians
Article Text:
Yuzvendra Chahal is likely to return for Punjab Kings in the IPL 2025 Qualifier 2 against Mumbai Indians. (PTI)

TimesofIndia.com in Ahmedabad:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Arshdeep Singh: India‚Äôs Left-Arm X-Factor? üáÆüá≥üî•

MI vs PBKS weather report

MI vs PBKS pitch report

MI vs PBKS predicted playing XIs

'I don't want to be a one-season wonder': Punjab Kings' Shashank Singh

Mumbai Indians:

Impact Sub:

Punjab Kings:

Impact Sub:





Punjab Kings (PBKS) battled through three bouts of drizzling on Saturday ahead of IPL 2025 Qualifier 2 against Mumbai Indians (MI) at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.There were three mild showers during PBKS' three-hour training session in Ahmedabad. Ahead of the big match, PBKS may get their most experienced player, Yuzvendra Chahal , back in action. The 34-year-old, who missed PBKS' last three matches due to a wrist injury, would be desperate to play on Sunday.Chahal's right wrist was protected, but the veteran spinner did train. He played football, took catches, and bowled a few balls in the empty net. It is yet to be seen how much his wrist has recovered, but TimesofIndia.com has learned that he is ready to take injections, if needed, to get back into the playing XI.Chahal, a wily customer, will be needed by Shreyas Iyer against the five-time champions MI, who never slip up in the playoffs.Meanwhile, MI have had their own share of injury issues. Deepak Chahar, who didn't play the Eliminator due to a hamstring strain in his left leg, was at the venue for his fitness test.The MI team had reached Ahmedabad at AM on a chartered flight, but their coaching staff and medical team were at the stadium, conducting Chahar's fitness test. The other MI bowler who made it to the stadium was left-arm quick Reece Topley.Chahar looked fine, but if he is not match-fit, then Topley might play his first match for MI.While there have been some light pre-monsoon showers in Ahmedabad in the days leading up to the match, the forecast for Sunday, June 1, suggests a low chance of rain during match hours.The covers from the pitch at the Narendra Modi Stadium came off for barely five minutes, with MI coaching staff, including head coach Mahela Jayawardene, taking a quick look. This is the same pitch on which Gujarat Titans defended 217 against Rajasthan Royals, and Chennai Super Kings defended 230 against the home team. One can expect a run-fest in Qualifier 2. Of the 14 innings played in Ahmedabad, teams have crossed the 200-run mark on nine instances.Rohit Sharma, Jonny Bairstow (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (c), Naman Dhir, Mitchell Santner, Deepak Chahar, Reece Topley, Jasprit Bumrah, Trent BoultAshwani KumarPrabhsimran Singh, Priyansh Arya, Josh Inglis (wk), Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Shashank Singh, Marcus Stoinis, Azmatullah Omarzai, Harpreet Brar, Kyle Jamieson, Yuzvendra ChahalVyshak Vijaykumar
Article Summary: Yuzvendra chahal is likely to return for punjab kings in the ipl 2025 qualifier 2 against mumbai indians. The 34-year-old, who missed pbks' last three matches due to a wrist injury, would be desperate to play on sunday. Mi have had their own share of injury issues. Deepak chahar, who didn't play the eliminator, was at the venue for his fitness test.

NEW DELHI: Ahead of the crucial five-match Test series between India and England, India A will face off against the England Lions in the first of two Unofficial Tests starting May 30, Friday, at the St. Lawrence Ground, Canterbury.Leading India A is captain Abhimanyu Easwaran , who will be backed by a strong squad featuring notable players such as Yashasvi Jaiswal, Karun Nair, Ruturaj Gaikwad and Shardul Thakur.Captain: Abhimanyu EaswaranVice-Captain & Wicketkeeper: Dhruv JurelBatters: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Karun Nair, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Sarfaraz KhanAll-rounders: Nitish Kumar Reddy, Shardul Thakur, Manav Suthar, Tanush KotianWicketkeeper: Ishan KishanBowlers: Mukesh Kumar, Akash Deep, Harshit Rana, Anshul Kamboj, Khaleel Ahmed, Tushar Deshpande, Harsh DubeyThe England Lions, led by Somerset‚Äôs James Rew, bring a balanced mix of emerging talents and experienced campaigners. Notably, all-rounder Chris Woakes returns after recovering from an ankle injury ahead of the five-match series.Captain: James RewBatters: Jordan Cox, Emilio Gay, Tom Haines, Ben McKinneyAll-rounders: George Hill, Dan Mousley, Rehan Ahmed, Chris WoakesBowlers: Sonny Baker, Ajeet Singh Dale, Rocky Flintoff, Josh Hull, Eddie Jack, Farhan AhmedThe matches will be live-streamed on the ECB website and app but won‚Äôt be broadcast on any TV channels in India.May 30, Friday: 1st Unofficial Test ‚Äì St. Lawrence Ground, Canterbury, 3:30 PM ISTJune 6, Friday: 2nd Unofficial Test ‚Äì County Cricket Ground, Northampton, 3:30 PM ISTThis series offers a valuable platform for both sides‚Äô fringe and upcoming players to stake their claim ahead of the main India-England Test clash.

Chris woakes returns after recovering from an ankle injury ahead of the five-match series.

Article Title: ‚ÄòNothing but love‚Äô: Shubman Gill shuts down rumours of rift with Hardik Pandya
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya and Shubman Gill at the toss. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you believe there was a rift between Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya? Yes, I think there was tension No, they seem to be on good terms

Shubman Gill returns to the city where it all started for him as a youngster





Gujarat Titans skipper Shubman Gill has put an end to swirling rumours of a rift with Mumbai Indians captain Hardik Pandya following a viral video from the IPL 2025 Eliminator.On the evening of May 31, Gill took to Instagram to share photos of himself smiling with Pandya, accompanied by a clear message: ‚ÄúNothing but love. (Don‚Äôt believe everything you see on the internet) @hardikpandya93. ‚ÄùThe story, though brief, was enough to calm fans and dismiss speculation that the two Indian stars were not on good terms. Gill‚Äôs post served as a public clarification that there is mutual respect between the two players and that the perceived tension may have been exaggerated online.The controversy began after a video clip from the toss went viral on social media. In the footage, Hardik Pandya extended his hand for a shake, but Gill appeared to walk past without acknowledging it. The clip immediately drew attention, with many interpreting it as a deliberate snub.Adding to the drama, when Gill was dismissed early in the match for just 1 run, Pandya was seen celebrating animatedly, further fuelling the narrative.However, Gill‚Äôs calm and composed response on social media has seemingly ended the speculation.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans skipper shubman gill has put an end to swirling rumours of a rift with mumbai indians captain hardik pandya following a viral video. Gill took to instagram to share photos of himself smiling with pandya, accompanied by a clear message: ‚Äúnothing but love. (don‚Äôt believe everything you see on the internet) @hardikpandya93.

Article Title: Miami Dolphins reluctant to trade Jalen Ramsey due to his expensive contract and trade market challenges
Article Text:
Jalen Ramsey trade standoff as Dolphins resist contract terms (Image via: Getty Images)

The real reason behind Jalen Ramsey trade deadlock







The Miami Dolphins and Jalen Ramsey saga is quickly turning into one of the most talked-about stories in the NFL. Once a key player in Miami‚Äôs defense, Ramsey now faces a turning point. His relationship with the team has become strained, and his big contract is making a trade complicated. But is Miami holding back only because of the money, or is there more to this situation that fans and experts haven‚Äôt figured out yet?Jalen Ramsey‚Äôs time in Miami is undeniably strained. Rumors swirl that his locker room relationships have soured, and the Dolphins appear ready to move on. Yet, the real obstacle isn‚Äôt just about player dynamics, it‚Äôs about the massive financial burden Ramsey‚Äôs contract places on Miami‚Äôs salary cap. The Dolphins are clear: they want to trade Ramsey but refuse to shoulder much of his guaranteed money, creating a complicated dance with potential suitors.ESPN insider Jeremy Fowler shed light on the hold-up, emphasizing that while interest in Ramsey is high, teams are wary of taking on the full financial weight of his deal. This isn‚Äôt just a minor negotiation; it‚Äôs a power play over millions in guaranteed cash. Miami‚Äôs strategy is to wait until after June 1, a date when the NFL‚Äôs salary cap rules allow them to free up significant cap space by moving Ramsey.This waiting game has frustrated many, as it delays the inevitable.A dam Schefter‚Äôs reports underline this growing impatience, noting that a trade announcement could come as soon as June but won‚Äôt be processed until the post-June 1 window opens. Meanwhile, Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel keeps a tight lip on the matter, focusing publicly on the current roster and refusing to elaborate on Ramsey‚Äôs uncertain future.Amid all this, Ramsey himself took to social media, trying to defuse fan backlash and clarify his mindset. His message was a rare glimpse into his perspective, he hasn‚Äôt lost respect for the cities and fans he‚Äôs played for, but he‚Äôs clearly ready to turn the page.Also Read: Pittsburgh Steelers risk 2025 season by choosing rookie Will Howard over Aaron Rodgers Whatever happens next, Jalen Ramsey‚Äôs Miami chapter is closing amid controversy and financial chess, setting the stage for a high-stakes move that could redefine both the player‚Äôs career and the Dolphins‚Äô future defense. Fans are watching closely, waiting to see if Miami can finally cut ties without paying too high a price and whether Ramsey can find redemption elsewhere.
Article Summary: The miami dolphins and jalen ramsey saga is quickly turning into one of the most talked-about stories in the nfl. Ramsey's relationship with the team has become strained, and his big contract is making a trade complicated. But is miami holding back only because of the money, or is there more to this situation that fans and experts haven't figured out yet?
